(已轉換為香港時間)
6月3日
8am - 9am
8pm - 9pm

6月4日
2am - 3am
8am - 9am
8pm - 9pm

6月5日
2am - 3am


Tips:
1)唔一定要用體感
2) 多人戰時 十字掣/A/B/X/Y/Click右菇可轉Lock
3) 角色轉色法:
While choosing a character, click and hold the left joystick down, while choosing a direction (up, down, right or left) with the joystick still held down in a clicked position, and then choose the character by clicking A. Each direction has its own colour!
4) 體感mode時雙joycon向前後左右傾可控制角色方向
5) 體感mode Joycon揸法

5月26日公開發售
詳情: http://www.uniqlo.com/utgp2017/hk/



任天堂@ E3 2017

1. 6月14日 凌晨12點 Online發佈會:Nintendo Spotlight - 集中介紹Switch 2017年遊戲
2. 任天堂樹屋 - Spotlight完結後即時開始, 直播試玩新嘅3DS&Switch遊戲
3. 將舉辨ARMS & Splatoon2 世界賽
4. 現場會有Super Mario Odyssey同其他Switch遊戲首次公開試玩
詳情: https://e3.nintendo.com/



常見問題


Q: 孖車8/炸彈人/其他連網game online玩唔到?
A: 港服未開, 去https://accounts.nintendo.com轉region做日本/美國

Q: 顯示電量有問題?
A: Bug黎, 未有更新解決到, 盡量用Sleep Mode叉電

Q: 點揀叉電器/USB-C 線?
A: https://i.imgur.com/5oXEONa.png

Q: JoyCon手帶調轉插點算?
A: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7bfhKo7dqIo

Q: 點連5Ghz WiFi?
A: Set 個WiFi Channel去36-64 or 100-140之間

Q: 部機黑畫面/定咗格/撳電源掣冇反應
A: 長撳開關掣十二秒

Q: 要keep咩先有保養?
A: 1. 需維修的主機及配件 2. 主機外箱　 3. 印有銷售店舖名稱或蓋印之購買收據　4. 主機包裝內之香港原裝行貨保固證 http://www.nintendo.com.hk/switch/repair.html

Q: 孖車8/Zelda咩版先有英文/日文?
A: 跟你部機嘅語言(可以入設定轉)，無中文

Q: Switch行版/日版/美版有咩分別?
A: 行版有保養同香港用嘅三腳火牛(不過任何版本都係用國際牛)，其他一樣，內置多國語言(無中文)

Q: Switch有無鎖區?
A: 無，eShop 分區跟 ac，一機可同時登入 8 個 ac

Q: 點解話入唔到eShop?話shop not available?
A: 港服未開，建議開多個美國/日本ac 入 美/日eShop啦

Q: 左Joy-Con出事?
A: Joy-Con連接/同步問題解決方法:
更新Switch系統後插左右Joy-Cons落Switch本體再重開機或可解決Joy-Con連接/同步問題
亦可嘗試入手掣setting disconnect joycon 再重新開機
都係唔得嘅可以致電香港任天堂安排測試&更換
http://www.nintendo.com.hk/switch/repair.html

Switch and Play

跟機國際牛，不設鎖區

聖劍3
6個主角,三男三女
三條故事線
你揀o既第一個角色,就決定邊條線
其實只有部份不同

夠level就可以轉職
每人最多轉職兩次:初級>上位
每次轉職要揀 光/暗
所以每個角色最終職業有4種(光光,光暗,暗光,暗暗)
每個職業都有唔同技能同魔法

武器防具無加到特別系統(聖劍2有熟練度,我唔太熟)

統傳rpg玩屬性,
地圖夠大,BOSS夠多,PLAYTIME 要廿小時以上
難度其實偏高
不過煲LEVEL一定夠打

Splatoon2國際邀請賽詳情

時間: June 13, Approximately 2:30 p.m. PT

隊伍:
US - Deadbeat
JP - Dynameu
EU - Rising Moon
AuNz -Blue Ringed Octolings
上述四隊皆為過去數月本地賽勝出者

比賽內容:
During the show in Los Angeles, teams will battle in a round-robin Turf War tournament that will decide seeding for the next round. All teams will play one another and get a chance to scope out their opponents’ strengths and weaknesses. In the next round, teams will battle in the game’s Ranked Battle modes. The semifinal stage will be a best-of-five battle, while the championship will be best-of-seven.

獎品:
The winning team of the live-streamed tournament will win global bragging rights and will have their names engraved on a sweet Splatoon 2 trophy.

主持:
Announcers for the Splatoon 2 tournament will be avid Splatoon player, Nintendo fan, athlete and broadcaster Jordan Kent, Ashley Esqueda of CNET and the Nintendo Treehouse’s Eric Smith.

Will Nintendo announce new details about its new online service plan at E3 2017?

We will announce further details later this year.


Does the compilation of classic games include Super Nintendo and Nintendo 64 games?

At launch, the classic game library will include NES games. Super NES games continue to be under consideration, but we have nothing further to announce at this time.


Will the test version of the chat app launching this summer include the appointment feature?

Starting this summer, any Nintendo Switch owner with a Nintendo Account and a supported smart device will be able to use a version of the smart-device app with limited functionality. We have nothing further to announce at this time.


Is a subscription to the new Switch online service the only way to get classic games or will there also be a virtual console-type service that allows you to purchase games individually?

We have nothing to announce on this topic.

Are the Classic Game Selection compilation titles yours to keep as long as you're subscribed to Nintendo Online? Do you lose access to these games if you unsubscribe?

The Nintendo Switch Online collection of classic games is available only to users with an active subscription

- USB Type-C 係可以用黎做好多嘢，但係唔代表應該用 Type-C 完全取代其他嘅插頭規格 (指 USB/Thunderbolt 3 以外嘅嘢)
- 有個 Type-C 插唔代表所有用 Type-C 嘅配件都要 support 到 (現實係冇可能) (* 唔計 on9 DRM) (*: 唔計唔跟 spec 嘅嘢)
- 夾硬用晒 Type-C 只會增加成本
- Type-C 市場未夠成熟 (睇下成堆 on9 QC 3.0 同埋 Switch Dock/火牛 完全唔跟 standard 做嘢)
- Headphone jack 已經俾 Apple 搞到變咗信仰問題，拗黎冇意思，只會變雞同鴨講

我覺得arms 係節奏問題

其實係隻game對有利方既優勢太多
中麻之後無論點跳點避其實都一定會比人捉到
比人打低對方節奏捉得好出左拳起身唔夠無敵時間又係食拳
同埋好似上面巴打講 先手後手問題係好重要
加上隻game偏重跳同避，要一邊避一邊出到想要方向既拳好難，鞋然係唔係都用追尾系既拳

比人打底訓底左起身方向可以控制 其實好難打中 好易俾人後手

真係非常偏重跳同避 但係response rate唔算快 角色唔夠敏捷 最後變鬥後手都真係無癮

係有得轉方向起身，打的確係好難打中，但係捉個判定太大就好易捉到，加上起身個下無無敵時間，打得多知你咩時間起身可以出得捉黎無限拋死你
加上捉個判定比出拳大好多，捉完之後仲可以雙手痴返埋身等下個動作，唔似出完拳要等個拳返黎先可以再出，成隻game個平衡明顯未經過長時間測試就出
